comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content: I remember finding a bench just like that on a kerbside clean-up day in Mosman in the 1980s.  Vile green colour, with a chunk missing at the foot, so no good to sit on, but perfect for pot plants.  A friend said it looked like a railways bench.

comment.author: 7892196@N02
comment._content: Beachcomber "very Narrow" odd Gauge - it is a Victorian Train and therefore on Broad Gauge!!
